title: Hack League
description: IEDC WE Cell is here with Introduction to JavaScript, 5-day workshop to learn to use JS and create dynamic and interactive web pages. The session will be handled by Nandkishor R(Fullstack web developer, Freelancer).

title: TechForge
description: Get ready to unleash your skills and join us in TechForge the daily challenge by IEDC Bootcamp CEC. Whether you are a hardware enthusiast, a coding whiz, or a design guru, there is something for everyone!

title: Design Workshop
description: As part of WE_WEEK IEDC We Cell is here with an exciting Design Workshop to aid you to create stunning designs using Figma.Whether you're a beginner or an experienced designer, you'll walk away with skills,  experience, and valuable insights from our experienced mentor Sreelakshmi M, State Creative Lead IEDC NEST.

title: Introduction to Notion
description: In regards to We_Week, IEDC WE CELL CEC is ecstatic to bring to you a session on Introduction to Notion, a tool that blends your everyday work apps into one. The session will be handled by Parvathy Madhu, Student Lead, IEDC CEC.

title: Inspire For Innovators
description: IEDC Bootcamp CEC in collaboration with Paradox Productions is excited to announce a casting call for our upcoming video project- Inspire For Innovators organised by KSUM. Grab this opportunity and be a part of this exciting project!

title: IDEATHON
description: IEDC Bootcamp CEC is riveted to organize IDEATHON in connection with IPL 2.0. So folks boost your brain and start pitching down.
